Class GameStateManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.game.GameStateManager
public class GameStateManager extends Object
GameStateManager - Manages game state with Observer pattern. Single Responsibility: Manage and notify about game state changes. Design Pattern: Observer Pattern - Observers can subscribe to state changes (pause, game over, etc.) - Decouples game logic from UI components - Multiple listeners can react to state changes independently Responsibilities: - Maintain pause/game over/game started states - Notify listeners of state transitions - Provide observable properties for UI binding This replaces scattered BooleanProperty fields in GuiController.
